website_summaries.verdict: The JLab Gravity is a Bluetooth neckband combined with earphones that plug into it. It's unique and quite affordable, but don't expect much in terms of audio performance.
pros: Neckband can be used with any standard wired earphones

customer_reviews.title: Meh? Audio hiss!
customer_reviews.text: Confusing product: Selling point is the versatility, but it's ruined by audio hiss. No point in upgrading the headphones if they will be bottlenecked/hindered by this very noticeable hiss. Cable management needs work. It's bulky and uneven. Stabs your neck when laying down I had to modify the adapter to be more slim. Still uneven but that's too hard to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. More in description.
customer_reviews.text: I hated the earbuds in these, but easy enough to swap out. The battery life is amazing. The sound clarity is amazing. The call quality is amazing. People can hear me, and I can hear them. The only thing that I would have loved more, was if this came with some j5’s, or even my favorite headphones ever, j3’s. The battery lasts all day at work, and keeps going for me to watch shows on my phone when I get home. I love these, and they don’t seem like they will break anytime soon, I’m sure to get a long, happy life out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, and included earbuds sound great.
customer_reviews.text: This product is cool for two reasons. First, the battery life is very good. I get a full work day on a charge. Second, you can use your own earbuds. I have a pair of high-end earbuds that sound fantastic--but are corded. With this handy-dandy device, I can now listen wirelessly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: bubba bubba

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these, and while they work they are nice. The problem is that they only last a few months and soon become a useless piece of crap. When you try to return it, good luck! Even with the Fair Trade guarantee the company, JLabb makes it difficult. I'm done with them.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy46323

customer_reviews.title: Slides off your neck
customer_reviews.text: The sound and technical abilities of this headset are quite good. Works great with voice command, and background noise appears to be acceptable. The big problem: if the ear plugs are not in BOTH ears, the whole neckband will not stay around my neck. It constantly slides off, and I have come close to loosing it multiple times. Fiddling with ways to fix it, but so far these are bubblegum mat best.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good day, I never expected it to be so ...
customer_reviews.text: Good day, I never expected it to be so useful and easy to use, the first time I used it, the sound quality was incredible, it is very practical, I love the product, congratulations.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best concept wish they can do better
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing however it is a pain to wrap the cord also it becomes heavy on one side and slips off if not put correctly
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: On/off functions are terrible, very difficult to control
customer_reviews.text: On/off functions are terrible, very difficult to control, if at all. I like the neck band idea; however, the Gravity is clumsy and continues to find way to fall down back due to gravity.
customer_reviews.author: M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Jlab does it again
customer_reviews.text: #jlab4life I've been a fan of jlab since they came out with their dj inspired bass earbuds (2015) and they never cease to amaze 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work from the start
customer_reviews.text: These didn't even work or hold a charge returned and got a pair I love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really annoying.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work and they are constantly sliding off my neck. Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Can be better...
customer_reviews.text: Battery is good but the headset fall from my neck at lot , sound is ok but the cable managment is complicated and sometimes the wire coming off

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this head set again
customer_reviews.text: I liked the head phone just not the way I was treated

customer_reviews.title: Use your favorite headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Fiddly to get the wires just right, even and secure. Once you get it set up it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cykaca

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, my one qualm is that they're VERY floppy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Trent

customer_reviews.title: it is serious.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like taxas! They were faster than I supposed.
customer_reviews.author: sentivida

customer_reviews.title: ... the application i need the range of signal is terrible. IO plan to return this asap
customer_reviews.text: for the application i need the range of signal is terrible. IO plan to return this asap.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Prtactical, quality, value
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now, and I do love them. Highly practical, fairly comfortable, great battery life. With sporadic use I've pulled the life to up to three days. That being said (long story short) there are flaws. The rear cable management is hard to perfect, and can leave dangling cords. The shoulder rest part is slightly too small, which is fine for walking, but if you run and your body bounces it can fall off way too easily, and they arent water resistant as far as I know which is only a slight convienence. Other than that, they are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Seth Mathias

customer_reviews.title: as EVER EVERY SINGLE wireless product from jlab has a ...
customer_reviews.text: as EVER EVERY SINGLE wireless product from jlab has a very short life won't charge
customer_reviews.author: angelr

customer_reviews.title: These are the absolute worst. They constantly fall off your neck or get ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute worst. They constantly fall off your neck or get caught in stuff because of these abnormally long earbud wires that you have to wrap around this piece in the back. The picture is very deceiving. The sound is good but the functionality is horrible. I hate it! two weeks after having it i was looking to buy another brand. I hate it so much I'm writing this review.😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: John Matthews

product_meta.title: JLab Audio Audio Gravity Bluetooth Wireless Neckband Titanium 10Mm Drivers 10 Hour Battery Life Bluetooth 4.1 Extra Gel Tips And Cush Fins
product_meta.description: Instantly Wireless. Plug In Any Earbud, Any Brand (or use those included). Turn wired to wireless with the JLab Gravity Bluetooth Neckband Adaptor. Plug in any earbuds, or use the included JBuds Pro, with the Gravity Neckband that sits comfortably around your neck. Connect to Bluetooth on your device and you can GO anywhere wirelessly with up to 10 hours of playtime. All the controls you need are found on the neckband so you can pump up the volume, play, pause, or seamlessly make calls at the drop of a hat. It's the most versatile headset yet. WIRELESS TRANSFORMATION: Give your wired earbuds a full transformation to wireless, the Gravity features Bluetooth 4.1 allowing you to connect to your device from up to 30 feet away and continue hands free while you finish painting a room, washing your car, or simply hanging out by the pool. Easily hide your earbud wires with the Gravity's simple wire management system, completing the transformation from wired to wireless. Talk about an earbud makeover. TALK, TALK, TALK: Designed with phone calls in mind, the digital microphone is built in to the neckband for easy access and outstanding voice clarity. Seamlessly take (or reject) calls while you briskly walk to your next business meeting, run through campus, hop into a cab, or jump on a flight with the easy to use button controls. TRAVELING BATTERY LIFE: With a 10-hour music playtime you can listen to all your favorite tunes for a roundtrip flight from California to New York. Or keep chatting with up 12 hours of talk time. Recharge and get back at it. It's perfectly adaptable for your crazy, can't stop, won't stop life.
